name: liquid-ooze
effect: Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like absorb, it instead loses as many HP as it would usually gain. dream eater is unaffected.
short_effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.
flavor_text: The strong stench of the Pokémon's oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves.
